Verses: 1 pinbu Saalomon Erusalemile Than Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhukkuk Kaanbikkappatta Moriyaa Ennum Malaiyile Eboosiyanaagiya Ornaanin Kalam Ennum Dhaaveedhu Kuriththuvaiththa Sthalaththile Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaik Kattaththuvakkinaan.
2 avan Thaan Raajyabaarampannina Naalaam Varusham Irandaam Maadham Irandaam Thedhiyile Kattaththodanginaan.
3 dhevanudaiya Aalayaththaik Kattugiradharku, Saalomon Potta Asthibaaramaanadhu, Murkaalaththu Alavinpadiye Arubadhumuzha Neelamum, Irubadhumuzha Agalamumaayirundhadhu.
4 mugappu Mandabam Aalayaththinudaiya Agalaththinpadiye Irubadhumuzha Neelamum, Nootrirubadhumuzha Uyaramumaayirundhadhu; Adhin Utpuraththaip Pasumponthagattaal Moodinaan.
5 aalayaththin Periyamaaligaiyai Dhevadhaaru Palagaigalinaal Seydhu Pasumponninaal Izhaiththu, Adhinmel Pereechchuvelaiyaiyum Sangilivelaiyaiyum Siththiriththu,
6 andha Maaligaiyai Raththinangalaal Alangariththaan; Ponnaanadhu Parvaayeemin Ponnaayirundhadhu.
7 andha Maaligaiyin Uththirangalaiyum, Nilaigalaiyum, Adhin Suvargalaiyum, Adhin Kadhavugalaiyum Ponthagattaal Moodi, Koththuvelaiyaal Suvargalile Kerubeengalai Seyviththaan.

8 magaa Parisuththamaana Aalayaththaiyum Kattinaan; Adhin Neelam Aalayaththinudaiya Agalaththinpadi Irubadhumuzhamum, Adhin Agalam Irubadhumuzhamumaayirundhadhu; Adhai Arunooru Thaalandhu Pasumponninaal Izhaiththaan.
9 aanigalin Nirai Aimbadhu Ponsekkalaanadhu; Mel Araigalaiyum Ponninaal Izhaiththaan.
10 avan Magaa Parisuththamaana Aalayaththile Irandu Kerubeengalaiyum Siththiravelaiyaai Undupanninaan; Avaigalaip Ponthagattaal Moodinaan.

11 andhak Kerubeengaludaiya Settaigalin Neelam Irubadhu Muzhamaanadhu; Ondrinudaiya Oru Settai Aindhumuzhamaayirundhu, Aalayaththu Suvaraith Thottadhu; Marusettai Aindhumuzhamaayirundhu, Matrak Kerubeenin Settaiyaith Thottadhu.
12 matrak Kerubeenin Oru Settaiyum Aindhumuzhamaayirundhu, Aalayaththuchchuvaraith Thottadhu, Adhin Marusettaiyum Aindhumuzhamaayirundhu, Matrak Kerubeenin Settaiyaith Thottadhu.
13 ippadiye Andhak Kerubeengalin Settaigal Irubadhumuzha Virivaayirundhadhu, Avaigal Thangal Kaalgalaal Oondri Nindradhu; Avaigalin Mugangal Aalayaththu Utpuramaai Nokkiyirundhadhu.
14 ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Melliyanoolaalum Thiraiyaiyum, Adhile Kerubeengalin Uruvangalaiyum Undupanninaan.
15 aalayaththirku Munnaaga Muppaththaindhumuzha Uyaramaana Iranduthoongalaiyum, Avaigaludaiya Munaigalinmelirukkum Aindhumuzha Uyaramaana Kumbangalaiyum Undaakki,
16 sannidhikku Munnirukka Sangiligalaiyum Panni, Thoongalin Munaigalinmel Patravaiththu, Nooru Maadhalampazhangalaiyum Panni Andha Sangiligalil Koththaan.

17 andhath Thoongalai Avan Dhevaalayaththirku Munbaaga Ondrai Valadhupuraththilum Ondrai Idadhupuraththilum Naatti, Valadhupuramaanadharku Yaageen Endrum, Idadhupuramaanadharkup Povaas Endrum Perittaan.
